title: City Council approves Clarissa Brown-Smith as finance director - natchitochestimes.com
content: City Council approves Clarissa Brown-Smith as finance director  natchitochestimes.com
description: Carolyn Roy | News Editor The City Council confirmed a new finance director at the council meeting Monday. She is Clarissa Brown-Smith who is currently director of fiscal services at Shriner’s Hospitals for Children in Shreveport where she has worked for nine years. She will start at the City in about 30 days. Brown-Smith, who…
